links.title: How Will Apple (NASDAQ:AAPL) Partnership Affect XRP Value?
links.description: The announcement that Apple (NASDAQ: AAPL) will adopt Ripple for installment record and administration could be incredibly advantageous for both Apple (NASDAQ:AAPL) and the crypto industry. While Apple (NASDAQ: AAPL) is adopting Ripple's technology and not Ripples XRP coin, it is possible that the coin may possibly be adopted in the future.

links.title: AAPL unable to break through key resistance level
links.description: Highlights Overview AAPL ended the week 1.22% higher at 188.58 after gaining $0.43 (0.23%) today ahead of tomorrow's Memorial Day. Today's closing price of 188.58 marks the highest close since May 11th. Closing within the previous day's range, prices failed to decisively move beyond the prior day's trading range in a lackluster session.
